name: Zaxby's Chicken Fingers Dipping Sauce
author: franny
summary: This sauce is really good with chicken and a great alternative to the traditional BBQ sauce. I like the full teaspoon of black pepper. This is also great on a chicken sandwich.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste
directions: Whisk mayonnaise, ketchup, and garlic powder together in a bowl; add Worcestershire sauce to the mayonnaise mixture and whisk until smooth
Sprinkle enough black pepper over the surface of the mayonnaise mixture to cover; stir to incorporate
Repeat sprinkling and stirring of black pepper
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until the seasonings have blended into the sauce, at least 2 hours
